title: Wicked
description: Elphaba, a young woman ridiculed for her green skin, and Galinda, a popular girl, become friends at Shiz University in the Land of Oz.

title: The Godfather
description: The story centers on the patriarch, Vito Corleone, and the transformation of his youngest son, Michael, from a reluctant outsider to a ruthless mob boss.

title: The Butterfly Effect
description: College student Evan Treborn discovers he can travel back to painful moments in his childhood by reading his journals.

title: Mal√®na
description: 12-year-old boy named Renato in a small Sicilian town during World War II becomes obsessed with the town's most beautiful woman.

title: The Polar Express
description: A young boy who doubts Santa Claus on Christmas Eve is taken on a magical train ride to the North Pole.

title: The Wizard of Oz
description: Dorothy is swept away by a tornado to a magical land.

title: Citizen Kane
description: A reporter investigates the final word of a newspaper magnate.

title: Casablanca
description: A cynical expatriate must choose between love and duty.

title: Parasite
description: A poor family schemes to infiltrate a wealthy household.

title: Avengers: Endgame
description: The Avengers take one final stand against Thanos.
